line.annotation: create_ing(ing73, "1/4 cup butter or margarine, softened")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, beat bananas, sugar, oil and eggs until well blended.
In a mixing bowl, beat bananas, sugar, oil and eggs until well blended.
line.annotation: combine({ing64, ing65, ing66, ing67}, ing77, "banana mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, beat bananas, sugar, oil and eggs until well blended.
line.annotation: mix(ing77, t13, ing78, "blended banana mix", "beat until well blended")

line.originaltext: Combine dry ingredients; fold into the banana mixture until well mixed.
line.annotation: combine({ing68, ing69, ing70, ing71, ing72}, ing79, "dry ingredients", "")
combine({ing78, ing79}, ing80, "bar batter", "fold dry ingredients into blended banana mix until well mixed")

line.originaltext: Pour into a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.
Pour into a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes; cool.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes; cool.
line.annotation: cook(ing80, t15, ing81, "unfrosted bars", "bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes; cool.
For frosting, cream butter and sugar in a mixing bowl.
For frosting, cream butter and sugar in a mixing bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing73, ing74}, ing82, "creamed butter and sugar", "cream")

line.originaltext: Add orange juice and peel and beat until smooth.
Add orange juice and peel and beat until smooth.

line.annotation: combine({ing81, ing84}, ing85, "frosted bars", "spread frosting over unfrosted bars")
